newsitem.title: USA: US mortgage application volume fell in latest week.
newsitem.headline: US mortgage application volume fell in latest week.

text.p: The volume of U.S. mortgage applications fell 24.4 percent in the week ended November 29, according to a Mortgage Bankers Association of America weekly survey.
The volume of applications to refinance mortgages fell 21.7 percent in the latest survey week, while applications to purchase mortgages fell 25.6 percent.
The seasonally adjusted refinancing index fell 2.2 percent, to 449.5 from 459.5 in the previous week, it said.
The purchase index fell 2.6 percent, to 193.5 from 198.7, it said.
